entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
